snippet.title: Custom Segment Controlled UITableView User Request
snippet.description:
Back after a long while to answer a student request. In this lesson, I'll show how to create a custom UITableView that is controlled through a UISegmentControl component.

Appstore JSON APIs
https://www.letsbuildthatapp.com/course/AppStore-JSON-apis
